q: Michael Vick Young situation, but he wants the veteran with the team in 2011. " Michael Vick Young is Michael Vick Young," said Ron Washington , who plans on trying to talk to Young on Tuesday. He has a reputation and I respect that reputation. I know exactly what Michael Vick Young brings. He can bring a lot to us in defending our American League championship. I certainly want him around here. "I read he's looking for someplace where he can get on the field defensively full-time. If that's the case, whatever he feels is best for him. But I hope it's not because he thinks his at-bats are being taken away. He'll get his at-bats. "When somebody gets 49 points in the first three quarters obviously its going to draw attention to the other team," said Allen Iverson , whose career high of 60 came against Orlando on Feb. 12, 2005. When somebody's got 49 points they want to make sure I get the ball out of my hands, and that's what they did. My responsibly is to give it up and my teammates had to make plays. They couldn't. DOE funding will help Veeco to speed up its efforts to commercialise multi-stage thermal deposition production systems used to manufacture cost-efficient CIGS Solar cells. Commenting on the Veeco award, Senator Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-NY) said, Developing new, clean, homegrown sources of energy is a vital part of our economic recovery. This federal investment will help drive research and development of new solar power technology, helping make solar power more efficient. By making solar power more effective and affordable over the long term, we can cut emissions,

Mike Pence said he made the final decision not to run for president Wednesday night. He and his wife told their two daughters and then called their son, who is in college, early Thursday. We just concluded that while we could seek the presidency, we concluded that our best opportunity to continue to serve the people of Indiana was either in Washington, D.C., or here at home, Mike Pence said. Thursday afternoon, Mike Pence sent a letter to supporters and told politicians, such as Sens. Dick Lugar and Dan Coats , of his decision. Though Mike Pence said staying in

a former Reagan administration aide who started a campaign to draft Mike Pence for the GOP presidential nomination. Marjorie Dannenfelser , president of the Susan B. Anthony List, a group that opposes abortion, said she trusts that Mike Pence has come to the place that's right for him and his family. "What I most want is for him to have a long future," Marjorie Dannenfelser said. "So I'm sure that he's made a discernment that this is the right move."
